title: Vanuatu Beachfront Bliss with Daily Breakfast, A$300 Dining Credit & Return Airport Transfers
description:
Escape to one of the scattered jewels in the Coral Sea with a stay at this Vanuatu beachfront haven. Boasting its very own private beach, direct access to the rainbow reefs, a two-tiered sparkling pool and self-contained suites, time slows right down at this slice of island paradise.

When you're not sipping on Cafe Villa's mango margaritas poolside or grazing on wood-fired pizzas at Three Pigs restaurant, uncover Vanuatu's untamed natural wonders. Swim next to the cascading waterfall of Mele Cascades, swing from a rope into Rentapao River or dive into the snorkelling hot spot of Top Rock - all within easy reach of the resort.
